prompts.text: CHAOS ROUND! Everyone takes a penalty. No exceptions. No excuses.
{player1}, you have 60 seconds to make everyone laugh. Fail = triple penalty
Reverse psychology! The person who MOST wants to take a penalty... doesn't have to!
{player1} becomes the dictator! Make a rule that lasts 5 rounds. Breaking it = penalty
Everyone stand up and spin 10 times. Last one still standing picks who takes a penalty
{player1}, call a random number from your contacts and sing happy birthday. Wrong number? Even better!
Anarchy mode! Everyone takes a penalty, then immediately takes another one
{player1}, switch clothes with {player2} for the next 3 rounds. Refuse = 5 penalties each
Scream as loud as you can! Quietest person takes a penalty. Neighbors be warned!
{player1}, speak only in song lyrics for the next 5 rounds. Slip up = penalty
Floor is lava! Last person with feet on ground takes a double penalty
{player1}, do your best animal impression for 30 seconds straight. Breaking character = penalty
Musical chairs but with penalties! Loser of each round takes one. Play until there's a champion!
{player1}, give your phone to {player2} for 60 seconds. They can post ONE thing. Veto = triple penalty
Everyone has to speak in accents for the next 3 rounds. Dropping accent = penalty
{player1}, do everything in slow motion for 2 rounds. Breaking character = penalty
Chaos lottery! Everyone puts their name in a hat. First drawn takes 3 penalties, second takes 2, third takes 1
{player1} and {player2}, have a loud argument about something ridiculous for 30 seconds
Everyone text 'I need to tell you something' to a random contact. Best response wins!
{player1}, pretend to be a robot until someone laughs. They take the penalty!
Hide and seek penalty! {player1} counts to 20, worst hider takes a penalty
{player1}, propose to {player2} dramatically. On one knee. The whole thing.
Everyone run to touch something blue. Last one takes a penalty!
{player1}, read the last 5 texts you sent out loud to the group
Freeze! Nobody move for 60 seconds. First to move takes a penalty
{player1}, invent a new word and use it in a sentence. Group votes if it should be real
Hot potato with a pillow! Drop it = penalty. Every 10 seconds someone's eliminated
{player1}, become {player2}'s personal assistant for 3 rounds. Refuse a task = penalty
Backwards round! Say everything backwards. First mistake = penalty
{player1}, dramatically re-enact a famous movie scene. Oscar-worthy or penalty!
Speed stacking! Build the tallest tower with cups in 30 seconds. Shortest tower = penalty
{player1}, you can only respond with questions for the next 3 rounds. Statement = penalty
Trust fall! {player1} falls, someone must catch. Catcher = immunity, bad catch = penalty for both
Everyone has to compliment each other... sarcastically. Best sarcasm wins immunity!
{player1}, act out your morning routine in 60 seconds. Every detail!
Simon says extreme! {player1} is Simon. 5 rapid-fire commands. Any mistake = penalty
{player1}, speak like you're narrating a nature documentary about the party
Extreme rock paper scissors! Best of 5. Loser does 10 pushups OR takes a penalty
Everyone fake laugh for 30 seconds. Most convincing wins. Least convincing = penalty
{player1}, lead the group in 30 seconds of interpretive dance
Whisper challenge! {player1} whispers to {player2}, who whispers to next person. Last person says it loud. If wrong, {player1} takes a penalty
Everyone swap an item of clothing with the person on their right. Keep it for 3 rounds!
{player1}, create a 30-second infomercial for the most boring object in the room
Limbo time! Use a broom or stick. First out takes a penalty
{player1}, dramatically read the last email you received like it's a love letter
Yoga challenge! Everyone hold a tree pose. First to fall takes a penalty
{player1} vs {player2}: Who can hold their breath longer? Loser takes a penalty
Everyone write a haiku about this party in 60 seconds. Best one picks who takes a penalty
{player1}, pretend the floor is a tightrope for the next 2 rounds. Fall = penalty
Human knot! Everyone holds hands and tangles up. Untangle in 2 minutes or everyone takes a penalty
{player1}, speak in only emojis (by describing them) for 2 rounds
Tongue twister battle! 'She sells seashells' - first to mess up takes a penalty
{player1}, pretend you just won an Oscar. Give an acceptance speech!
Everyone run outside and back. Last one takes a penalty. Ready? GO!
{player1}, become a statue for 60 seconds. Anyone who makes you move takes a penalty
Blind taste test! {player1} guesses what {player2} feeds them. Wrong = penalty
Everyone tell their best joke. Funniest (voted) picks who takes a penalty. Worst takes one too!
{player1}, give a motivational speech about literally anything. Make us believe!
Paper airplane contest! Furthest flight wins immunity. Shortest takes a penalty
{player1} and {player2}, have a thumb war. Loser takes a penalty, winner makes a rule
Everyone must rhyme for the next 2 rounds. First non-rhyme = penalty
{player1}, do your best impression of someone in this room. We guess who!
Speed round! Everyone says something they love about {player1}. Slowest takes a penalty
Chaos finale! Everyone takes a penalty. Then hug it out. Party on!
